/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The trees, with their lush green foliage, form a natural canopy over the street, providing shade and a sense of tranquility. A black car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modernity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
